suite.name: Administration General and Legal Hold Test Suite

test.name: TC12160 Verify the process of creating Ligl user by selecting Ligl user option in +User modal with Manual Password
TC22050-Ligl and SSO users- Check whether User is able to Accept EULA page for first time Login when Common Spirit Instance config is False
TC22059 Verify the process of creating Ligl user by selecting Ligl user option in +User modal without selecting Manual Password
TC37985 Verify the process of creating SSO user by selecting SSO user option in +User modal
TC12104 Ligl users- Verify the process of editing existing users by using Edit User button in grid
TC25171 SSO User- Check whether 'Reset Password' button in grid is Click Disabled
TC22508 Check whether Password strength validation is displaying for fields when user enters weak password
TC22868 Verify that user should not be able to login with old password
TC21215 Check whether user is able to click 'Reset Password' button in grid and Manually Reset password successfully
TC21217 Admin Reset Password Manually- Verify whether user is able to login with New password
TC22518 Check whether Logged in user is able to Change Password after Admin Reset Password
TC22519 Check whether 'Change Password' option is present in User profile and user is able to again login succesfully with new password
TC51897 Verify the unavailability of 'Change Password' option in logged in SSO User profile icon
TC28525 Ligl and SSO users Check whether user is able to change role to another role
TC28525 Ligl and SSO users Check whether user is able to change role to no role
TC51900 Ligl User Create and Edit- Check duplicate validation message is displaying for 'Username' field
TC51900 SSO Users Create and Edit- Check duplicate validation message is displaying for 'Username' field
TC28540 Check whether user is able to create new Ligl and SSO Users without choosing Role from 'Roles Assigned' dropdown
TC28551-Ligl Users - Check whether user is able to change the Status (Active/In-Active) any time
TC28536-Ligl user- Check whether Alert should be displayed when No Role user logs in
TC25196-Ligl User- Check whether user is able to click 'Reset Password' button in grid and Reset password without selecting 'Manual Password' checkbox by clicking 'Yes' button
TC28581-Ligl and SSO User- Check that Validation should be displayed in Login page when In-Active status user logs in
TC28539-Ligl and SSO users- Check whether Logged in user is displaying with Assigned role after changing role of user
TC33890-Employee Master- Verify the process of Creating new Employee using +Employee button
TC40183 Create and Edit Employee- Verify user is able to save successfully without filling 'Title' field.
TC40182 Create and Edit Employee- Verify 'Title' field is an optional field
TC51896 Employee Edit- Verify whether mentioned fields are non-editable
TC43113 Create and Edit Employee- Verify Maximum length of Mobile,Telephone and Fax numbers fields should not exceed 20 digits
TC35807 Create and Edit Employee- Check whether Designation is changed to 'Title'
TC30468 Employee Edit- Verify whether 'HR Status' , 'Hire Date' , 'Terminated Date' fields are editable
TC40180 Employee +Bulk Import- Check whether user is able to import employee without filling 'Title' field
TC20363 Create and Edit Employee- Verify mentioned Optional dropdown fields are available and user is able to save successfully
TC29212 Create and Edit Employee- Verify availability of Mentioned Optional Additional fields
TC56374 Employee Import-Verify the Functionality of Import employee by giving both Mandatory and Non Mandatory fields in Full Template
TC56376 Employee Import-Verify whether user is able to import employee by giving all fields in Short Template
TC56372 Employee Import-Verify that user is able to import Employee by giving all mandatory fields in Full Template
TC8712 Contact Master- Verify the process of Creating new contact using +Contact button
TC7067Create and Edit Contact- Check whether Party names are displaying based on selected Contact type and Party type
TC42959 Create and Edit Contact- Verify Maximum length of Mobile, Telephone and Fax numbers fields should not exceed 20 digits
TC42982 Create and Edit Contact- Verify Mobile number field is an optional field
TC7065 Create and Edit Contact- Check whether Party types are displaying based on selected Contact type
TC8735 Parties- Verify the process of Creating new Party using +Party button
TC8746 Parties- Verify the process of Editing Party using Edit existing Party button in grid
TC42968 Parties- Verify Maximum length of Mobile, Telephone and Fax numbers fields should not exceed 20 digits
TC1983 Email Templates- Verify the process of creating new template using +Template button for 'Case Approval' category.
TC35048 Email Templates (System)- Verify the process of editing Subject and Content for mentioned email template categories.
TC35049 Email Templates (System)- Check that '+Template' and 'Delete' buttons are click disabled for mentioned email template categories
TC21664 Case Settings- Verify the process of creating new Case settings template using +Template button
TC22060 Case Settings- Check whether newly created Case settings templates are populating in 'Case Settings Template' dropdown in +Case modal
TC54559 Requests-Check whether admin is able to create, edit the request type lookup value
TC54587 Case-Check whether admin is able to create, edit the Entity and Sub Entity lookup value
TC54576 Check whether admin is able to create or edit the case type lookup value when cs config is false

TC54583 Check whether case type user defined look up value is populated in the case type dropdown in create case popup
